results.name: Rebels - Under the Spell of Magic (Chapter 3)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (32bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1366x768 or better Display

Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel 8+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MX250
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card:

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3500x or Intel i5-9400f
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR Only
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600x or Intel i5-9600
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR Only

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Dual-Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please drop quality settings if not seeing 60FPS. This game is best-played buttery smooth!
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3.5GHz Quad Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Consistent 58-60FPS on Ultra with these specs in pre-alpha testing.
